task.title: Verifying the installation of
task.shortdesc: You can verify the installation of by using the Messaging Tester sample application.

taskbody.context:
This procedure uses a sample application and a demonstration MQTT endpoint to verify the installation of the server. The demonstration MQTT endpoint allows applications to connect to on port 1883, and from any configured IP address. The endpoint has a messaging policy and a connection policy that is associated with it. These policies allow all applications to connect. After you verify the installation, you must disable the endpoint to prevent unauthorized applications from accessing .
You can use the to download the sample application. Alternatively, you can run a hosted version of the application which is available on MQTT Helper. If you use the hosted version, you must ensure that your machine can access the internet.
For more information about endpoints, connection policies, and messaging policies, and how these configuration items are used to restrict access to , see .

step.cmd: Go to the Messaging Tester Sample Application page in one of the following ways:

choices.choice: From the Home tab, click Messaging Tester Sample Application in the Verify your configuration with the IBM IoT Message Gateway Messaging Tester sample application pane.
From the Messaging menu, click Sample Application.

step.cmd: Follow the instructions on the Messaging Tester Sample Application page to complete the verification procedure.
